desc: 60% boost to Def, Rec and max HP of Earth types, enormously boosts BB gauge each turn, probable Spark critical, damage taken boosts BB gauge, probable resistance against 1 KO attack & activates BB gauge boost each turn effect at turn's start
lore:
An imposing oxhead decoration affixed to the top of Ulagan's yatga, his favored stringed instrument. As a celestial ox, his strength was second to none, but he much preferred pounding out melodies than skulls on the battlefield.

During a night of interclan revelry that turned violent, Ulagan stunned everyone into captivated silence with the earth-shattering epic of the gods. His baritone passion rekindled their sense of community.

Since then, no warrior has given him further grief for his perceived indolence, for strength comes in many unexpected forms.
name: Windstorm Oxhead
